text: Nic Armstrong is a British singer-songwriter, musician, painter and public artist. After writing and recording The Greatest White Liar album he founded the band Nic Armstrong & The Thieves (briefly changing the name to IV Thieves, before reverting). Nic Armstrong released Nic Armstrong & The Thieves' Pocketless Shirt EP in November 2013.nicarmstrongmusic.com ==References== == External links == *Official Website *Nic Armstrong (MTV.com) *NPR Category:Living people Category:British male singers Category:British male musicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Nic Armstrong
